title: Collared
description: On the morning of their one-year anniversary, submissive Dara must decide whether or not she will continue her relationship with her Master, Jonathan, or return to her vanilla lifestyle. She wants nothing more than to commit to him beyond their expired contract, but doing so means she will have to reveal once and for all the horrid secret of her past, which she can't yet bear to face herself. Guided by entries in her training journal, Dara embarks on a journey of self-discovery, psychological horrors, and recollections of nights of wanton passion as a sexual submissive.
author: Nola Lively
